title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.59 - Hearings; continuation of
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.59 - Hearings; continuation of

State Regulations

The hearing shall continue from day to day until
completed unless the hearing officer concludes that extraordinary circumstances
warrant otherwise. The hearing officer may, in the hearing officer's
discretion, adjourn the hearing to a different place by announcement thereof at
the hearing or by other appropriate notice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.59

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
